title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 666.4 - Customer operations expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 666.4 - Customer operations expense

State Regulations

The customer operations expense accounts, 6610 through
6623.3, shall include the cost of performing customer related marketing and
services activities described in narratives for individual accounts. These
costs shall also include the costs of supervision, office support and training
for these activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
666.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
